name: parking-space-prototype
description: A cross-platform parking space booking system with real-time navigation

scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:admin
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:admin
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:admin
scripts.clean:frontend: cd frontend && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json build
scripts.clean:admin: cd admin-dashboard && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json build
